The N.C.C.R. becomes effective upon passage and approval. The CCB hereby repeals the administrative regulations (NAC 453A and 453D ) adopted by the Department of Taxation pursuant to chapters 453A and 453D of NRS governi ng the licensing and regulation of marijuana establishments and medical marijuana establishments.
